body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play Spellbinder, exile Thunderheads
2. equip creature (in my case Invisible Stalker) with Spellbinder
3. attack, deal combat damage to opponent
4. wait 'til Thunderheads resolves, 1 token is put onto battlefield, no option to replicate What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expected: since Thunderhead is casted by Spellbinder, I should get to replicate it. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.48.860, Linux Mint 16 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Spellbinder + replicate: spell is cast without the option to pay the additional cost
content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 21, 2014 22:17:30_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play Spellbinder, exile Thunderheads
2. equip creature (in my case Invisible Stalker) with Spellbinder
3. attack, deal combat damage to opponent
4. wait 'til Thunderheads resolves, 1 token is put onto battlefield, no option to replicate What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expected: since Thunderhead is casted by Spellbinder, I should get to replicate it. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.48.860, Linux Mint 16 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=533_
